content.title: Home Church
content.description: It's pretty much the best thing we have going. We meet online and in homes during the week to hang out, build relationships, and dive into Sunday's teaching together.

image1.alt: Three friends talking together around a kitchen table during home church.

content.text1: We believe something really good happens when we intentionally come together to share life, grow deeper spiritual friendships, and create space for real conversations about how we can live the Jesus-centred life.

We meet during the week online and in homes to develop relationships, study and apply Sundayâ€™s teaching, and care for our neighbourhoods. Home Churches are open and welcome to new people; use our home church finder to connect with a group and jump right in! It's a casual vibe with discussion, prayer, and the opportunity to ask questions. Our Home Churches are made up of even smaller groups called huddles. We believe discipleship is most fully realized in the small authentic community of a Home Church huddle where we can develop deep relationships with fellow disciples of Jesus.

As a result of COVID-19, many of our home churches are gathering online. If you're looking to connect with community online now's a better time than ever! Find a home church and connect with its leader for more details.

image1.alt: A group of friends connecting online using video chat.

content.text1: Some Home Churches are designed with the entire family in mind, so kids and youth are welcome to join. Home Church leaders will help tailor the discussion to include everyone or create space where kids can learn and participate with friends their age.

image1.alt: Parents and children together at home church.
